DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: SM_Table_S4
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Summary of visitation data and fruit feeding behavior for frugivorous birds that feed on Euterpe edulis fruits in defaunated and non-defaunated Atlantic forests in Brazil. The data include information for each species from focal observations in different areas of the defaunated and non-defaunated sites, totaling 2326 h of observation. Small, small-gape (≤ 12 mm) frugivores; Large, large-gape (> 12 mm) frugivores.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: frugivory
seed dispersal
rainforest
evolution
mutualism
fragmentation
defaunation
phenotypic selection
